alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:47PM CDT until April 04 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL POLK...EAST CENTRAL GUTHRIE...SOUTHWESTERN BOONE AND DALLAS COUNTIES... At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Linden, or 10 miles northwest of Adel, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dallas Center, Perry, Minburn, Perry Municipal Airport, Bouton and Woodward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and west central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
